metadata.name: Blinking LED Circuit
metadata.description: Single LED controlled by GPIO0 with current-limiting resistor. Program GPIO0 to toggle between HIGH and LOW for blinking effect.

components.description: Red 5mm LED - anode (long leg) to 15E, cathode (short leg) to 16E

wires.description: GPIO0 signal wire to LED anode side
Wire connecting GPIO signal down to resistor (same column bus)
Wire from resistor to ground bus (same column)
Ground wire to LED cathode side
Pico ground pin to LED cathode
